job_title: Administrative Assistant Senior in Buenos Aires
pros: Spiritual and worthwhile religious values. Share empathy with work mates and similar life perspective and organization goals.  Pleasant human enviroment.
cons: Low salaries for a place with a high inflation but not recognized by the government.  Rate inflation is disguised in an institutional manner showing only half of real rate of inflation. Our organization does not want to recognize this real fact; a fact it's not under our controll
